ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Opportunity__r.Account.ShippingState = "New Jersey", FS_Fees__c > 171, Surplus_Lines_Quote__c = True, ($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator'), ($Profile.Name <> 'API User'), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2021-04-10"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: FS Fees for NJ must not exceed $171 (250 - 79 State Filing Fee).
